website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek a countdown timer that moves toward zero, not away from it, this is a good stopwatch to consider.
pros: Large water resistant casing fits well in hand
cons: Buttons very sensitive – can cause restarts
The alarm volume can be very low

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good replacement for a cheap Amazon stopwatch that couldn't handle rain but no watch funtion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a lower price Amazon stopwatch whistle combo awhile back and in due time thanks to being outdoors in the rain the numbers started not light up properly. Purchased this stopwatch and so far after three weekends in the rain it has performed flawlessly. My only gripe, I wish it was a regular watch function thus the 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: hondast1100

customer_reviews.title: Great stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: We run races weekly with a 3 minute countdown. I like that you can set it for 3 minutes, & it will reset to that easily for the next race. The continuous reverse count after the 3 minute mark allows you to see how long each race takes before resetting for the next race. At 2:55 the watch begins a quick beeping with a long continuous beep as it hits zero.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor1

customer_reviews.title: The countdown timer is a great feature
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch has been a blessing for me. As the head non-skating official for a roller derby league, I am responsible for a lot of stopwatches to include the period clocks. One thing most stopwatches don't have is a countdown timer, they count up. The countdown timer helps keep the jam timer and the scoreboard operator (who maintains the visible clocks) synced up. And it eliminates a lot of extra math trying to figure out what the clocks should be changed to when the visible clock is counting down and the backup clock is counting up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product that works well and is pretty easy to use. It comes with a convenient cord for hanging around your neck, in case you're going to use it as a stop watch at sporting events. The size did surprise me when I opened the box. I didn't really expect it to be as large as it is, but that could play either way. The larger size could be bad if you carry a lot of junk in your pockets and expected to put it there, on the other hand though, it is a real advantage if you want a timer that is easy to see and easy to read, even the hundredths of a second.
customer_reviews.author: Elder Statesman Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Took a few minutes to get used to using it, but instructions were very clear. I would recommend playing with it for 5-10 minutes to get used to it before taking it to the gym. Only downside is it doesn’t have an on/off switch and battery looks like it’s going to be annoying to replace. I’m pretty rough on my equipment, as it gets banged around with my other gear, but it has proven to be very durable
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Koval

customer_reviews.title: Great stopwatch for the price
customer_reviews.text: I help referee a flag football league and we purchased some of these for our games. Has a large easy to read display, button don't stick and have a good feel so you know when you've pressed it. It also beeps on start and stop for countdown, which is critical for our purposes. We've used these in rain and snow with no problems. One complaint is that the battery lasted less than a year, much less than some other more expensive stop watches we've had. However, considering the batteries are extremely cheap to replace, it's still much less expensive than other options even if I have to replace a battery every year, so I'm not removing a star.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Use it all the time, spring through fall. Use it to keep track of yard and garden watering schedule. Remember reading complaints about battery life. I bought it in mid-2013 and am still (in late 2016) using the battery that came with it. The only time it doesn't work for me is when I'm making so much noise that I can't hear the alarm (such as when I'm using equipment with a loud running engine). So, here's an idea: make one that has a small jack for an earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful, as the British say
customer_reviews.text: Does what I want (timing rest intervals between sets in the gym) intuitively without a lot of stuff I don't want. Plus, it has a lanyard so you can wear it around your neck and do your best Flava Flav impression.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: They are very light weight but very easy to use and one of the few that actually has the countdown timer on it. For the price good value but having time tested it for durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Great stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: Timer alarm very hard to hear and only chirped once so if you missed it it defeated the purpose. Other than that its a great stop watch
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Too quiet, alarm sound too short
customer_reviews.text: Useless as a timer. Sound is way too quiet and shuts off by itself after only a couple of seconds (not manual shut-off for sound). Big and clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size - Alarm is a bit quiet
customer_reviews.text: For the most part I'm happy with this stopwatch. I've only had it a short time, but it seems to work, being farily well-made and I like being able to hang it around my neck. What I don't like is that when the alarm goes off, it's not very loud and I could definitely see in a loud environment that you might miss it. I use it manly as a countdown timer and for some reason after it finishes the count down, it sounds the alarm for just 4 beeps and then keeps counting. I'm not sure why it does that, but it doesn't make much sense. It's just a minor irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sensitive to Water
customer_reviews.text: Dead after 6 days of use. Got water inside and died. To be fair my son did take it under water a couple times briefly. That was all it took.
customer_reviews.author: ggNoRe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for paintball games
customer_reviews.text: I have owned one of these for three years. I use it as a countdown timer for paintball games, once a month, all day. I think I have replaced the battery once. It works great! It is easy to reset it for games of different length. I set it, start it and drop it inside my jersey, hanging from my neck. It beeps the last 5 seconds, then a louder beep at time up. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for me
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted an inexpensive, but water resistant stopwatch for casually working out and get an idea of progress. This one is easy to use and read. I haven't had it long, so I can't speak for it's durability or longevity. I'm guessing if its that important to you, you might want to look for something a bit more expensive. I can't say I think it is shoddy workmanship and doesn't look really cheap. If you're a connoisseur or seriously training for a major event, it might not do the job for you. But for just casual use, I think it's perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Horror movie holic

customer_reviews.title: Good Watch...and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Good Stop-and-Go Stop watch. I used it only for stop and go timing and it worked perfect. I even accidentally washed it with my gym clothes and it still worked. I didn't put it in the dryer because during the washer-dryer transition. I ended up losing the watch somewhere and just downloaded an interval training app for my cell phone. The watch had other features like lap and countdown but I never needed them. I would buy this watch
customer_reviews.author: the_get_man

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Someday they tell us where the off switch is... battery is sure to die soon. Cheap
customer_reviews.author: Not drinking the Koolaid

customer_reviews.title: Best ones by far
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of them for derby. Using for scrimmages and bouts. One I use for the period clock and the other for 2 min jams. Best ones I have found by far.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice stopwatch if you need all the different functions
customer_reviews.text: I really only needed the countdown function and as a result you have to go through a lot of unnecessary steps to clear and set up different times. Otherwise pretty nice
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Robic timer that just didn't work as advertised. I needed a countdown watch that would beep when it reached "0" - this Oslo timer does that and has done it reliably. The two downsides are the "beep" isn't as loud as the Robic timer it replaced, and the timer is larger than the previous timer. Because of it's reliability I made a good choice, and I'll get used to the beep and the size!
customer_reviews.author: UmpJJ

customer_reviews.title: Power button?
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife so it had to be simple to use with large, easy to read numbers and waterproof. This fit the bill. The only complaint I have is there is no way to turn it off as far as I can tell. No mention of this in the instructions. I guess I'll wait to see if there is an auto shutoff feature. I doubt it since the stopwatch was on (and running) in its plastic blister package when I opened the box from Amazon. All in all a good value. We'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Count-down Feature Was Hard To Find
customer_reviews.text: Found all manner of stopwatches but not many with the countdown feature. I can set my time requirement for exercises and when the time interval is complete, another button sets it back to the original time period. Light-weight plastic housing with neck lanyard — won't withstand being run over by your truck, but plenty strong for normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Great Stopwatch at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Oslo 2.0 Stop watch to be used in timing a manufacturing process during an evaluation at a facility. We purchased six of them to test different areas at the same time with diverse people. The stopwatch is operated flawlessly and did not require any intense training on how to use. The stopwatches are rugged enough to withstand several months of testing. The stopwatches themselves are very easy to use right out of box. We are very satisfied with the purchase of the Oslo Silver 2.0 stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Saponaro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, excellent purchase. How do I turn this off when I’m not using it?
customer_reviews.author: Aceman730

customer_reviews.title: Easy operation, but bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stopwatch to time my sets during my weight training. I have only used it for a few days, but I am already in love with it. It works exactly as advertised, and could not be simpler to operate. However, I was surprised at how large the stopwatch is. None of the pictures on the webpage offer a good perspective for scale. This was a pleasant surprise, because my hands are rather large, so the watch fits perfectly in my palm with the buttons within easy reach of my thumb and forefinger.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zoghbi

customer_reviews.title: I love the dependability and ease of use of the Oslo ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the dependability and ease of use of the Oslo stopwatches. I use them for officiating roller derby and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy the Finger

customer_reviews.title: Best for roller derby.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for roller derby. After trying Half a dozen different ones this is the easiest to read and has good buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: If you know a little about stopwatches, this watch will be very easy to use. I didn't even look at the instructions to operate the watch. Even if you don't know much about stopwatches, the instructions are easy to understand. As for shipping and handling, living overseas I received the watch very quickly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anton A.

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to quickly set a countdown and its a rather quiet beep. Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Pitcjer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set or reset
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was to big until I began to use it. Not. Posts complaining that it's too complicated to use are without merit. I bought this for it's countdown capability and use it during weight training. very easy to set or reset. If you use this for a specific purpose and use it frequently, you should have no troubles. If you're an occasional user, keep the instruction booklet handy.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but batteries don't last long
customer_reviews.text: The design is nice, it's a little big but comfortable with very big easy-to-read numbers. It functions nicely. The initial battery lasted less than 4 months for me. Replacement requires opening 5 screws and kind of prying out the LR44 battery.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Winston

customer_reviews.title: I use these for sporting events
customer_reviews.text: These are kind of the "standard" in my sport field. Countdown mode. Big buttons. Wish the button pushing "action" was quicker. Like it takes finger muscles to push, and for precise timing, it's a bit tough to be spot-on precise. Also, wish there was a way to turn off the beeps when you press a button. Otherwise, love it. Bought 3. One of them died within a couple hours of use, and needed a new battery.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mae

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use. Although say "waterproof" I'm not immerse the timer in water to test the resistance, because I saw comments such problems. I prefer to keep the clock in perfect condition and care for it as if it were delicate. I like the option to set countdown time. If it should happen some unexpected problem, I'll let you know as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: ok...for the price
customer_reviews.text: For me, I only need very simple functions on a stop watch (lap, split, and countdown). This stopwatch had all 3, great so I bought it. I do, however, need something reliable. I just need it to work and not break if I accidentally drop it. So for, it's survived a couple of drops. However, the battery died on me after 5 months of very limited use. I'm disappointed. I've had casio watches last for years on the same type of battery (LR44). Either this stopwatch sucks energy like crazy or they sent it to me with a poor quality battery. Either way, I'm giving it only 2 starts and would recommend another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Performs as expected. Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a reliable stop watch that would last - this one does the trick. No frills, no time, and no date - so don't buy this if that's what your looking for. But if you need something cheap that you can drop a handful of times on the floor and keep it working, I recommend this one for you.
customer_reviews.author: NAVY04

customer_reviews.title: Great Countdown Function
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for a stopwatch that has a 1/100th second countdown timer, and oh boy this was the one. The only downside to this was a personal problem. The beeper stopped working. And, the timer would start to count up after it finished counting down. I wish it didn't do that, but this was the best one I found.
customer_reviews.author: MasterBaconeer

customer_reviews.title: Oslo Silver 2.0 Twin Stop Watch And Countdown Timer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stopwatch and countdown timer. It is very easy to use. My only gripe about this stopwatch is the fact that you can't turn it off. It's been on for last year and half (since i bought it). However, it is cheap, and it works very well. I wonder how long the battery will last.
customer_reviews.author: REDNERD

customer_reviews.title: functional and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I have purchased. As a personal trainer I guess I am kind of rough on these things but this one is durable, functional and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve LeonTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Simple, Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Had one for years, and never had a problem with it until I left it behind at the gym. Had to get another one, as timing rest periods and intervals is important to me. Can't see ever looking to get a different stopwatch, seeing as how reliable this one has been.
customer_reviews.author: Work-a-day Joe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not last one pistol shooting season. Hard to operate and did not last at all... 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alarm may not be loud enough?
customer_reviews.text: Meets expectation. One exception is that the alarm is not very loud in volume. So if you are in a noisy environment and use the countdown timer, you may not hear it. Easy to setup and ergonomics are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N. Marsteller

customer_reviews.title: Works well, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The stopwatch is larger than I expected, but the display quite visible, and so far, it works great. It seems to be a good product for the price. I would recommend it. (I only use the stopwatch feature, so I'm not sure how well the other features work.)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Dillahunt

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap little stopwatch, but is one of the few that provides countdown functionality, which was specifically what I needed. I've had it over a year and used it moderately, but it continues to serve its (humble) purpose just fine.
customer_reviews.author: turbo54

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for timing. We use these in our roller derby league.
customer_reviews.author: MJGS

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality & priced right!  =)
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband & he loves it!!He wanted a stop watch & something he does not need glasses or a magnifier to see with....& this one works perfect for him he said!! GREAT price! Quick delivery & packaged safely! =)
customer_reviews.author: CC40

customer_reviews.title: Don't dump this in your gear bag
customer_reviews.text: Because the buttons are external, if you put this in you gear bag expect the battery to drain quickly. The buttons will get pressed up against your other...stuff. I appreciate the simple operation.
customer_reviews.author: that guy

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: After refereeing 5 games of flag football, this timer broke down on me. I brought it since it had the countdown feature which I needed, but this was poor quality/construction. Spend $10 more and get a timex watch with the coundtdown timer.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Y.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but lacks a timer function
customer_reviews.text: No timer countdown function make this stopwatch much less useful. I use it to referee some games, but it's tough to relay the play clock when I'm counting down and the stopwatch is counting up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it . I just use it for countdown to do workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: No backlight
customer_reviews.text: Amazon says this has a backlight, but it does not. I'm returning it and buying the Ultrak 360 Stopwatch, which I can see in the photo has a light button.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. K. Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good size for the hand. Legible in bright light. Simple to set for countdown.
customer_reviews.author: /B

customer_reviews.title: Great, great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with this stop watch. I initially just wanted a cheap one that I could used to check a speedometer. Worked great for that and I keep finding more uses for it. Well built, what a find!
customer_reviews.author: Tomcat_104

customer_reviews.title: Great Stop Watch, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The best feature about this stop watch is how easy it is to use. All the basic features a coach needs for any sport at a great price. You can also you multiple modes. I use the countdown and split for soccer. Most functions at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: dsdevo

customer_reviews.title: Okay for its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I taught gym class at a private school for a year. It doesn't shut off but the battery lasted about 5 months. Worked good other than that. Feels very cheap. I would be afraid to drop this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great stopwatch. Only issue I had was that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stopwatch. Only issue I had was that the package must have been sitting for some time as the battery needed replaced as soon as I received it.
customer_reviews.author: B Lysaught

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these stopwatches easy to use (I never read directions) they are also lightweight and accurate. Love them. (I bought two)
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Gold

customer_reviews.title: A compact, attractive, multi-functional stop watch!
customer_reviews.text: I think I've said it all in the subject line. It's a relatively simple, compact, attractive, yet multi-functional stop watch!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Has a countdown timer feature which is what use it for.
customer_reviews.author: G. Parden

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stopwatch to use as a countdown timer for my high intensity interval trainings. Now, of course, it doesn't inspire one with overwhelming quality. It has functioned just like I have needed it to. I consider this stopwatch a real bargain. The quality matches the prices perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Senesky

customer_reviews.title: Very nice basic timing button action
customer_reviews.text: Very nice basic timing button action. The split timing action button manipulation has confused several operators. I have used the device for the past month.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Moon

customer_reviews.title: Nice big display, flimsy-feeling construction
customer_reviews.text: I love the nice big display on this stopwatch -- you can start the timer and set it down while working out yet still read the numbers. My only concern is it feels a little cheaply made, I'm not sure about the durability of it. But so far so good, it does exactly what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Rex F. Baldazo

customer_reviews.title: Who counts down from 9 hrs?
customer_reviews.text: yes, the watch has a count down timer, but it will not let you count down from any number you want. it goes directly to 9 hours and counts down...what? I tried pressing all the buttons to see if I could get a hour/minute, but nothing. I'm sure the stopwatch is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Richard David Sharpless

customer_reviews.title: Works but you can't turn it off.
customer_reviews.text: Can't turn it off!!! Crazy waste of battery life. I use stopwatch in the summer - so it stays on all winter? I read the instructions and there is NO off.
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the Lake

customer_reviews.title: False Ad
customer_reviews.text: Opened it up, read through the direction and reread Amazon ad. NO BACKLIGHT! We needed something to see at night and this stopwatch advertised it had backlight, it doesn't! Returning now!
customer_reviews.author: dinosmongoose

customer_reviews.title: no problem..
customer_reviews.text: This watch has helped me so much in avoiding a lengthy rest gap between work stations. This watch may consume too much battery because it cannot be turned off; but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Jordan

customer_reviews.title: They are the best stopwatch I have ever used and were recommended by ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this stopwatch for roller derby. I actually sometimes use two of these. They are the best stopwatch I have ever used and were recommended by every roller derby official I know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Stopwatch is okay.
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch is okay but the battery when dead after 1 year. Maybe I left it on, However, now I use the stopwatch on iPhone which it works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Los

customer_reviews.title: a great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive stopwatch. I like to have a stopwatch laying around my desk at work for impromptu measurements. Because I work in a cubicle environment, having something like this that isn't valuable enough to steal but still works perfectly is a big plus. If all you're doing is measuring lap times, I can't see why you'd pay a penny more for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: J. York

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: This is not a countdown timer, certainly not what I was looking for and right now it's sitting in a desk draw doomed to stay there.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McFee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I like to time my work-outs in the morning and this does a great job--I particularly like the very positive on and off switch--you know without looking when you hit the "on" button--and others--cheaper ones-- I have had sometimes you're not sure
customer_reviews.author: James C. Mourlas

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: It looked alright, felt alright and worked pretty well as a countdown and regular timing watch for roller derby. And then it just stopped working. The screen went blank and it just started endlessly (and annoyingly) beeping. 5 screws and removing the battery and now I'm off to get a different stopwatch.
customer_reviews.author: dedi hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a period timer for roller derby bouts! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi A Owen

customer_reviews.title: Solid button control, professional timer
customer_reviews.text: As light weight as it is and the relatively cheap price, I am surprised by the strong construction and firm feeling when the button is pushed down.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Breath - Fast Run

customer_reviews.title: Have had one before and was happy to get another
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding stopwatch. Have had one before and was happy to get another.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Galloway

customer_reviews.title: No worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch lasted me 2 months. Read the warranty and it wil fix or replace it as long as it wasn't the battery. Tried to open the back of the watch to get to the battery and stripped the tiny screws so I can't get to the battery. This is made in China, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: A good stopwatch, but didn't quite have the feature I wanted: to countdown, beep (loudly) and continue counting down - so you can get a beep every 2 minutes for example. It is well made though.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: great device
customer_reviews.text: I think for the price this device is great! just what I needed. very easy to use, lightweight, big enough screen. somebody wrote in the review that alarm voice is low. I use the countdown when doing my yoga exercises, the voice is even a little too loud to me. if you need a countdown function, this device is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lika

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this particular stopwatch because it can count backwards from any time you desire. I use this watch everyday at work to time the twenty minute break accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Neglia

customer_reviews.title: No backlight
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this watch the description mentioned a backlight feature. I had some better options in this price range, but this one in theory included backlight, and that was the only feature that lead me to buy this. When I received the item I noticed the instructions did not say anything about a backlight and obviously the watch does not have it. It seems that now the description of the item has been updated. I do not recommend this watch since there are better options in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Solorio

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on a stopwatch out there!
customer_reviews.text: This unit performs just as well as units costing many times more. I've used mine for over two years and it works great every time. Great value!!
customer_reviews.author: SYD C.

customer_reviews.title: Simply, easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: really useful for keeping time. I know I can just use my iphone but you know what; for some reason an old fashioned timer really does work better.
customer_reviews.author: AllAboutJazz

customer_reviews.title: Great stop watch
customer_reviews.text: I'm a coach and this stop watch works great for in between classes and timing on my students. great features
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, light weight, large numbers ... what more could you ask for? This was one of the best purchases I've made for this type of "equipment" in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michele F. Adelaar

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: does not have a off option. battery ran out just after one meet (because there's no off button
customer_reviews.author: shing lee

customer_reviews.title: Timing is everything
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy if you are working out by timing yourself on every workouts. Specially if your doing P90X types of workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Stupidly bought this because it was [...] cheaper than the Gymboss. Within 6 months, the battery was dead. The manual doesn't explain how to turn it off, so there might not be a power-off feature at all. It's pretty big for a gym timer, and not the most space efficient thing if you're carrying it in your gym shorts, but it'll do. Basic functions (stopwatch, interval timer) are fine and work well. A waste of [...].
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I needed something like this for timing youth soccer games. It's easy to use. Instructions are reasonably clear. The count down feature is what sets this one apart. If you want a count down timer it narrows your choices significantly, but this relatively cheap unit has it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: John Fredine

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not water resistant in the least. Broke after getting slightly damp.
customer_reviews.author: Alura

customer_reviews.title: Great stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: After considering several models I chose this one. It is easy to operate and easy to read. It is serving me well and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lewin

customer_reviews.title: fine
customer_reviews.text: Good fulfillment. Product performs exactly as described and expected. No problems of any type. I would order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: doctorgus

customer_reviews.title: No clock but a good stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: It did not have a clock. But the stopwatch works just fine. It is good for the dedicated runner. It has never given me any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Great stop watch with timer
customer_reviews.text: My girls are soccer refs and it's exactly what they needed... they set the time for the quarter at it alarms them that the quarter is over. They like it because it's super easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Rai M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my 12 year-old son was looking for. He loves it. He said it works well and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Timpanaro

customer_reviews.title: quick and East
customer_reviews.text: quick delivery and a product that performs well and is easy to use. I will purchase tis product again if this one wears out
customer_reviews.author: H. Lloyd Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Has fun using all it's features
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and the recipient LOVES it! Has fun using all it's features.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: got this for boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: He likes it, doesn't use it often, but it is a simple enough stopwatch. Price is great too!! Shipped perfectly on time!
customer_reviews.author: kellymonster

customer_reviews.title: Oslo Countdown Stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered quickly and works as expected. Countdown start time is easy to set. Alarm begins to beep starting at 5 sec to expiration with a final long beep at expiration. The time counts up after the countdown time is reached until manually stopped. Watch does exactly what it's supposed to do and is simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: dfahammer

customer_reviews.title: Simple design and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: At first bought another stopwatch at Dick's. But it was such a pain to figure out how to use it, that I returned it a couple days later. And besides, it didn't have the countdown timer feature that I wanted most of all. I then looked on Amazon and found this Oslo Silver model. It's easy to use. Within a few minutes, I had it down pat. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Russell L. Acker

customer_reviews.title: Stopwatch with countdown functionality, very inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch is great for the money. Great functionality at this price. The countdown feature works great. No problems with it at all ... Would recommend it to anyone who looking for a simple stopwatch with countdown capability. Built solid, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ervin

customer_reviews.title: I would be nice if it displayed the time and date
customer_reviews.text: The countdown feature is what I needed. I would be nice if it displayed the time and date.
customer_reviews.author: JEF

product_meta.title: Robic Silver 2.0 Twin Stopwatch w/Countdown Timer
product_meta.description:
Combines a multi-mode Stopwatch with an easy-to-use Countdown Timer. Times any event or activity; easily and accurately, in a variety of ways

AMAZON.COM
Designed for coaches, trainers, and athletes, the Silver 2.0 Twin combines a multi-mode Stopwatch with an easy-to-use Countdown Timer. The Silver 2.0 Twin features a large, easy to read screen in an ergonomic casing with mode, start/stop, and split/reset buttons on the top. Suitable for use in any environment, the Silver 2.0 Twin is water resistant, and carries a one year warranty from Oslo. 

Key Features:

 * Event, lap, or split timing 
 * 1/100 second precision to 10 hours 
 * Two finish-time memory recall 
 * Unlimited time readings 
 * Countdown timer with time remaining and an audible alarm at completion 
 * Water resistant
 * One-year warranty
feature_bullets: Countdown Timer: Shows time remaining. Starts at a preset time and counts down (in reverse) to zero...this is used for Soccer, Basketball, Volleyball and any event which counts down time to zero...a beep tone signals the end of the timing.

Event:Start-Stop-Reset timing perfect for Volunteers for Simple, basic timekeeping, such as a 40 yard dash. Lap Timing:Allows you to take multiple readings each time restarting from zero Split Timing:Allows multiple time readings
Easy to use, Easy to Read, Pick it up and start timing Use the Silver 2.0 to time any event or activity. 1/100 second precision up to 10 hours Four Timing Options: Event, Lap, Split and Countdown
An unlimited number of time readings can be taken. 20 times more powerful than other stopwatches at this price.

Manufactured to the highest quality levels, use the Silver 2.0 with confidence for all your timing needs. Water Resistant...Large digital display Long life, snap action push buttons Classic, comfortable design is easy to hold...a pleasure to use.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
